subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Arsène Wenger said his 13-match winless streak against José Mourinho “didn’t play on my mind at all,” but he acknowledged that his players might have been affected by the club’s recent struggles against Chelsea.
snippet: Arsène Wenger said his 13-match winless streak against José Mourinho “didn’t play on my mind at all,” but he acknowledged that his players might have been affected by the club’s recent struggles against Chelsea.
